Saying Allahu Akbar when passing the Bla.ARABIC_TEXT: ((طَافَ النَّبيُّ صلى الله عليه وسلم بِالْبَيْتِ عَلَى بَعِيرٍ كُلَّمَا أَتَى الرُّكْنَ أَشَارَ إِلَيْهِ بِشَيْءٍ عِنْدَهُ وَكَبَّرَ)).
Saying Allahu Akbar when passing the Bla.LANGUAGE_ARABIC_TRANSLATED_TEXT: (The Prophet  circled the KaAAbah on a camel, every time he reached the black stone he would point to it with his staff and say: (Allahu akbar))
